translations: v．使熟悉，使了解：让某人或自己对某事物、环境或知识有更深入的了解。
· She is familiarizing herself with the new software.
她正在熟悉这个新软件。

sentences.sentence: Spend some time familiarizing yourself with this application.
sentences.translation: 用一些时间来让自己熟悉这个应用程序。

sentences.sentence: I spent the first few weeks familiarizing myself with the new job.
sentences.translation: 我用头几个星期的时间让自己熟悉了新工作。

sentences.sentence: Life in the modern metropolis was de-familiarizing. It de-naturalized language.
sentences.translation: 现代都市的生活令人陌生，让语言“去自然化”了。
